settings.heading: 5 Reasons
settings.subheading: Attn: Grace makes living with incontinence easier.
settings.text: You're here because you want to find a better way to manage your bladder leaks. Attn: Grace is here to help.

settings.heading: 50% of adult women have bladder leaks.
settings.text: You're not alone, and now there's finally a solution that's tough on leaks, safe on skin and gentler on the planet.

settings.heading: An immediate game-changer.
settings.text: Ready to stay drier, longer? 9-out-of-10 women say they  felt a difference almost immediately  after switching to Attn: Grace.

settings.heading: Ditch the itch.
settings.text: No more itching or painful skin irritation. Attn: Grace is skin-safe, meaning our pads and briefs are free of bleaches, dyes, fragrance and other harsh chemicals — plus they’re dermatologist tested and approved.

settings.heading: Luxuriously soft…
settings.text: Comfort matters. A lot. Our top sheet not only stays dry, it’s famously soft to the touch. Trust us, you won’t be disappointed.

settings.heading: Be a Force for Good.™
settings.text: Want to find a better way to manage your leaks and feel good about it? Attn: Grace is a Certified B Corp.™ – meaning we hold ourselves to the highest standards of social and environmental responsibility. Our products are all sustainably sourced, designed, produced and packaged.

settings.heading: 30% OFF
settings.text: We’re so excited to have you experience our skin-safe incontinence products, that we are willing to give you 30% OFF your first order at attngrace.com.

settings.heading: "I cannot believe   the difference.
settings.text: I really didn't know what was happening... The itch and irritation was maddening. For over a year I tried cream after cream, every product imaginable thinking it was hormones, menopause, skin changes. I would wake up in the middle of the night because the itch was so unbearable. WHO KNEW IT WAS THE PADS?? I cannot believe the difference. With Attn: Grace, it's just gone. And the fit and absorbency are so excellent. I just signed up for a subscription, and hope to not be without these pads, EVER."
